channel.description: math.LO updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: On groups well represented as automorphism groups of groups
item.description: arXiv:2407.09279v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: Assuming G\"{o}del's axiom of constructibility $\bold V=\bold L,$ we present a characterization of those groups $L$ for which there exist arbitrarily large groups $H$ such that $aut(H) \cong L$. In particular, we show that it suffices to have one such group $H$ such that the size of its center is bigger than $ 2^{|L |+\aleph_0}$.
item.dc:creator: Mohsen Asgharzadeh, Mohammad Golshani, Daniel Herden, Saharon Shelah
